description: : Welcome to my profile and I'm really happy, that you have paid precious attention to me by reading my words, concerning myself and my personality! I would describe myself in some words as energetic, happy, with a sense of humor and quite often may be in some funny or awkward life's stories. Secondly, I'm very sincere and honest. Definitely, I prefer speaking the truth and I love hearing, when people are telling the truth to me. I am a very aimed personality. I have achieved many things in my life, but I realized that I missed one important thing - family. I understand clearly that the most important thing for me is to meet the right man now. I am a caring and lovely lady and I know how to make my man happy. I want to create a strong family, where there is not going to be ME and YOU, there will be only WE! We are the best base for strong family in harmony! I am waiting for you, my future husband.
intent: Fun, Friendship, Romance, Serious Relationship, Marriage
